enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Spanish Studies students.
title: WCAS SPANISH 101-3-26 Elementary Spanish

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
For students who have studied Spanish less than two years. Communicative method. Development of speaking, listening, conversation, and grammar skills, as well as knowledge of Hispanic culture, through context.

Three class meetings a week.
Outside online video program twice a week.
Prerequisite: 101-2

subject: SPANISH
